cat > position_calculator.py << 'EOF'
import math

# Stock prices (opening prices for Dec 19, 2024)
stock_prices = {
    # US Stocks (USD)
    'MSFT': 439.21,
    'AAPL': 246.62,
    'NVDA': 131.73,
    'AMD': 122.16,
    'GOOGL': 191.01,
    'META': 608.97,
    
    # Hong Kong Stocks (HKD)
    '9988.HK': 82.53,   # Alibaba
    '3690.HK': 157.30,  # Meituan
    '1810.HK': 30.20,   # XIAOMI
    '0700.HK': 398.72,  # Tencent
    
    # A-shares (CNY)
    '002594.SZ': 92.83,   # BYD
    '601318.SS': 51.10,   # Ping An
    '603259.SS': 54.16,   # WuXi AppTec
    '300750.SZ': 261.75,  # CATL
    '600519.SS': 1511.34, # Moutai
}

# Exchange rates
usd_hkd = 7.7716
usd_cny = 7.2854

# Capital allocation
total_capital = 1000000
us_allocation = 400000   # 40%
hk_allocation = 300000   # 30%
a_allocation = 300000    # 30%

# Per stock allocation
us_per_stock = us_allocation / 6  # 6 US stocks
hk_per_stock = hk_allocation / 4  # 4 HK stocks
a_per_stock = a_allocation / 5    # 5 A-shares

print("Position Building Plan")
print("=" * 80)
print(f"Total Capital: ${total_capital:,.2f}")
print(f"Exchange Rates: USD/HKD = {usd_hkd:.4f}, USD/CNY = {usd_cny:.4f}")
print()

# US Stocks
print("US STOCKS (40% allocation - ${:,.2f})".format(us_allocation))
print("-" * 60)
us_stocks = [
    ('Microsoft', 'MSFT'),
    ('Apple', 'AAPL'),
    ('NVIDIA', 'NVDA'),
    ('AMD', 'AMD'),
    ('Google', 'GOOGL'),
    ('Meta', 'META')
]

for name, ticker in us_stocks:
    price = stock_prices[ticker]
    shares = int(us_per_stock / price)  # Whole shares only
    cost = shares * price
    print(f"{name:12} ({ticker:5}): ${price:7.2f} x {shares:4} shares = ${cost:8.2f}")

print()

# Hong Kong Stocks
print("HONG KONG STOCKS (30% allocation - ${:,.2f})".format(hk_allocation))
print("-" * 60)
hk_stocks = [
    ('Alibaba', '9988.HK'),
    ('Meituan', '3690.HK'),
    ('XIAOMI', '1810.HK'),
    ('Tencent', '0700.HK')
]

for name, ticker in hk_stocks:
    price_hkd = stock_prices[ticker]
    price_usd = price_hkd / usd_hkd
    shares = int(hk_per_stock / price_usd)  # Whole shares only
    cost_usd = shares * price_usd
    cost_hkd = shares * price_hkd
    print(f"{name:12} ({ticker:8}): HK${price_hkd:6.2f} (${price_usd:6.2f}) x {shares:4} shares = ${cost_usd:8.2f}")

print()

# A-shares
print("A-SHARES (30% allocation - ${:,.2f})".format(a_allocation))
print("-" * 60)
a_stocks = [
    ('BYD', '002594.SZ'),
    ('Ping An Insurance', '601318.SS'),
    ('WuXi AppTec', '603259.SS'),
    ('CATL', '300750.SZ'),
    ('Moutai', '600519.SS')
]

for name, ticker in a_stocks:
    price_cny = stock_prices[ticker]
    price_usd = price_cny / usd_cny
    # A-shares must be bought in multiples of 100 (one lot)
    shares_raw = int(a_per_stock / price_usd)
    shares = (shares_raw // 100) * 100  # Round down to nearest 100
    if shares == 0:
        shares = 100  # Minimum one lot
    cost_usd = shares * price_usd
    cost_cny = shares * price_cny
    print(f"{name:18} ({ticker:10}): ¥{price_cny:7.2f} (${price_usd:6.2f}) x {shares:4} shares = ${cost_usd:8.2f}")

print()
print("=" * 80)
EOF
